reviewText:
I took a crap once that came to life. That animated turd found a mate and they together were married and had several turd babies. One of those turd babies married a used diaper. Together they had one child. That child grew up and became a game developer and created a game called Snow Cat Simulator to sell on Steam.

This is not Farm Simulator with snow.

It is a thrown together turd/used diaper which sucks.

reviewText: The snowcat driver has really dead eyes. Wait... he isn't moving either. A tragic story of death and haunted snowcats. Mabey the other Snowcat Simulator will be better. >> http://store.steampowered.com/app/275100/

reviewText: First of all, idea is good. Make a game about snowcat's, those vehicles which are very important on skiing centers. But, here's come but: The way how this game is done is horrible. We have graphics from 2005, i mean, c'moon this game is published in 2014, i expect little bit better graphics. Controls were average but i experienced some input lag, controls lagged little bit when minicat were on carage. +Props for multible vehicles!

reviewText: This game... my friends: one hour of gameplay feels like 12 hours. If you wanna have fun" for a very long time
date: go and get it! A nice feature to extend the gameplay: save the game and you'll lose all your fuel. Very funny when you're at the end of the map and have to drive with amazing !!10Km/h!! back to the base!!! The controls are AMAZING and the mechanics are so creative!!! BUY IT!!!"
